message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. This is a great price considering the product's value to you is $8,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'm proposing a price of $8,250. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you is $8,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,750. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $8,500. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the product's value to me is $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offer and my minimum price. I'm proposing a price of $8,500. This is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not going to go below $8,000. I'm proposing a price of $8,000. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the product's value to me is $12,000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to consider other options.
